---
title: "Educational Measurement Solutions"
---

Educational Measurement Solutions (EMS) provides educational measurement expertise and data analysis services to organisations involved in large scale surveys and assessments. This includes specialist support to research teams undertaking projects in educational, psychological and social science contexts.

EMS services include:

* Data analysis for survey data
* Analysis of assessment data or attitudinal scales using Item Response Theory (IRT)
* Sampling
* Data processing for large-scale assessments and surveys
* Construction, administration, analysis and reporting of online surveys
